name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed malicious scripts via a command and scripting interpreter resulting in a data breach.

if-condition--c2c1666a-8489-42d6-9e56-f6.name: Check if the malicious script is running

action--fa2e3e76-0452-4c06-92ec-ce913b97.name: Kill malicious script process
action--fa2e3e76-0452-4c06-92ec-ce913b97.description: Terminate any processes that are executing the malicious script.

action--c2c10b15-bf91-4da3-a55d-9081acc3.name: Delete dropped file
action--c2c10b15-bf91-4da3-a55d-9081acc3.description: Remove the malicious file dropped by the attacker.

action--1a401af9-a1c9-4e34-9b98-b7b4ff9f.name: Monitor network connections to C2 server
action--1a401af9-a1c9-4e34-9b98-b7b4ff9f.description: Check for any active connections to the attacker's command and control server.

while-condition--monitor-network-connect.name: Monitor until all connections are examined
while-condition--monitor-network-connect.description: Continuously check network connections until all potential threats are monitored.

malicious_script_running.description: Check if malicious script is currently running

still_connected.description: Check if there are still connections to the C2 server
